ComicInfo.Title: The Cruel, Hot Summer
ComicInfo.Summary:
In which the election is decided, Snow gives birth, a blunder is revealed, threats are made, and an investigation is begun.
It’s a family affair as Snow White goes into labor, and the magical nature of her pregnancy becomes an event that no one expected. The ever-proper Miss White is about to discover that having the Big Bad Wolf's baby is more than she'd ever bargained for…but the proud papa may be in for the biggest surprise of all. Plus, the results of the election for Fabletown’s new mayor are in…and the winner may surprise you!
